EMBOLDEN

Have no fear. Be Courageous.


About Embolden

We motivate youth for challenges outside of school.

Lessons, videos and stories to inspire.

Our Values

MISSION: Our mission is to teach skills that aren't taught in schools.

VISION: Our vision is to reach 1 million students by 2020.
Whether they take away one skill, we want to make a difference in any way we can.
